    • Uses of Villager in fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegame.conversion

      Methods in fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegame.conversion with parameters of type Villager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract int[] Conversion.calculatePlayerAndVilValues(Player player, Villager villager)
      Calculates The player's and the villager's values for the convSucceeds-method.
      protected int[] Persuasion.calculatePlayerAndVilValues(Player player, Villager villager)
      The player's value consists solely of Charisma, the villager's of SelfAwareness.
      protected int[] Sermon.calculatePlayerAndVilValues(Player player, Villager villager)
      The player's value consists of Charisma and ArgSkills, and the villager's of Scepticism and ArgSkills.
      protected int[] Accusation.calculatePlayerAndVilValues(Player player, Villager villager)
      The player's value consists of Charisma and ArgSkills, and the villager's of SelfEsteem and ArgSkills.
      abstract boolean Conversion.checkIfAllowedToProceed(Villager villager)
      The villager's current number of conversions of this type is checked.
      boolean Persuasion.checkIfAllowedToProceed(Villager villager)
      The villager's current value of the number of persuasions is checked.
      boolean Sermon.checkIfAllowedToProceed(Villager villager)
      The villager's current value of the number of sermons is checked.
      boolean Accusation.checkIfAllowedToProceed(Villager villager)
      The villager's current value of the number of accusations is checked.
      boolean Conversion.convert(Player player, Villager villager, Sect sect)
      Increases the amount of conversions made to this Villager, calculates "battle values" for Player and Villager, checks who won.
      protected abstract void Conversion.increaseAmountOfConv(Villager villager)
      The number of conversions of this type for this villager is increased by one.
      protected void Persuasion.increaseAmountOfConv(Villager villager)
      Increases the villager's amount of persuasions by one.
      protected void Sermon.increaseAmountOfConv(Villager villager)
      Increases the villager's amount of sermons by one.
      protected void Accusation.increaseAmountOfConv(Villager villager)
      Increases the villager's amount of accusations by one.
      protected abstract void Conversion.winningActions(Player player, Villager villager, Sect sect)
      The winning actions for each conversion type differ from each other.
      protected void Persuasion.winningActions(Player player, Villager villager, Sect sect)
      The villager's self-awareness and scepticism decreases, and the players charisma increases.
      protected void Sermon.winningActions(Player player, Villager villager, Sect sect)
      The villager's scepticism decreases, and the players charisma increases.
      protected void Accusation.winningActions(Player player, Villager villager, Sect sect)
      The villager's self-esteem decreases, and the players charisma increases.
